citations.narrative:
Review and documentation of the review of the contingency plan was not performed within the last year. Annual review
and documentation ensures that the facility is making any necessary changes or refinements to the plan, and
documentation of this ensures accountability. The facility must review the plan annually and document the review.
Correct by 09 January 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
Review and documentation of the review of the contingency plan was not performed within the last year. Annual review 
and documentation ensures that the facility is making any necessary changes or refinements to the plan, and 
documentation of this ensures accountability. The facility must review the plan annually and document the review. 
Correct by 09 January 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
